con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://demo5649868.mockable.io/service/1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:mio="http://demo5649868.mockable.io/service/1"> <wsdl:documentation>mockable.io generated WSDL</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://demo5649868.mockable.io/service/1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:element name="getAccountDetailsRequest" type="xsd:anyType"/> <xsd:element name="getAccountDetailsResponse" type="xsd:anyType"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getAccountDetailsInputMessage"> <wsdl:part name="getAccountDetailsInputPart" element="mio:getAccountDetailsRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAccountDetailsOutputMessage"> <wsdl:part name="getAccountDetailsOutputPart" element="mio:getAccountDetailsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="accountservicePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="getAccountDetails"> <wsdl:input name="getAccountDetailsInput" message="mio:getAccountDetailsInputMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="getAccountDetailsOutput" message="mio:getAccountDetailsOutputMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="accountserviceBinding" type="mio:accountservicePortType"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getAccountDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction="getAccountDetails"/> <wsdl:input name="getAccountDetailsInput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getAccountDetailsOutput"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="accountserviceService"> <wsdl:port name="accountservicePort" binding="mio:accountserviceBinding"> <soap:address location="http://demo5649868.mockable.io/accountservice"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:assertion.name: Schema Compliance - Validates the Values Against Schema
XPath Match - Validates the Account Holder

con:configuration.scriptText: import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder // check for RequestId element in response def holder = new XmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContentAsXml ) def routingNumber = holder["//*:RoutingNumber"] assert routingNumber.length() == 7

import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder // check for RequestId element in response def holder = new XmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContentAsXml ) def accountNumber = holder["//*:AccountNumber"] assert accountNumber.length() == 10

import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder // check for RequestId element in response def holder = new XmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContentAsXml ) def overdraftProtection = holder["//*:OverdraftProtection"] assert overdraftProtection == 'true'

import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder // check for RequestId element in response def holder = new XmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContentAsXml ) def overdraftProtection = holder["//*:OverdraftProtection"] assert overdraftProtection == 'false'
